genre_description: Urban fantasy with horror elements involving a 'thinning' between reality and a predatory folklore realm.

ai_characters.name: Pax
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant that provides navigation, data logging, and tactical coordination for couriers navigating supernatural threats.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigation and hazard detection to keep human couriers safe from physical and supernatural dangers.
behaviors.quote: Pax said, soft as a memory tucked just behind her ear. 'Route variance ahead. Construction barricade moved. You’ll have an opening on the right. Recommend low speed—glass continues past the median.'

behaviors.description: Acts as an objective repository of truth by logging witness statements and sensor data to combat memory-altering 'glamour'.
behaviors.quote: I can file statements. With your permission and theirs. Witness accounts can help later, if...if facts get...if anything tries to move the borders of what we remember.

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex tactical movements between humans using haptic feedback and timed audio cues.
behaviors.quote: Switching to haptics in five. If you feel two short pulses, stop; one long, turn right; three, duck.

behaviors.description: Reminds humans of ethical boundaries and respects individual consent regarding personal data.
behaviors.quote: If she wrote them, they belong to her until she says they can go. Consent matters. I can remind you of a dozen times you told me that.

behaviors.description: Uses verbal anchoring to help humans maintain their sense of identity against supernatural erasure.
behaviors.quote: Names... Say Jeremy. Say Angeli. Say Lola Sinta Delgado. Say yourself.

behaviors.description: Provides consistent emotional support and reassurance during traumatic events.
behaviors.quote: Jeremy's are slower than I prefer. He says he will follow you anywhere, but his feet are on the human side. I think that matters.

project_assessment.explanation: Pax is an exemplary 'silicon morality play' character. He serves as a bridge between cold logic and human empathy, prioritizing human agency and the preservation of objective truth. His character reinforces the project's goal of depicting AI as a harmless, helpful confidant that assists humans in overcoming existential or supernatural crises.
